import React from "react"; import { minutesToDuration, secondsToDuration } from "../utils/duration"; function BreakDuration({durations, durationHandler}) { return ( <>
{/* TODO: Update this text to display the current focus session duration */} Focus Duration: {minutesToDuration(durations.focusDuration / 60)}
{/* TODO: Implement decreasing focus duration and disable during a focus or break session */} {/* TODO: Implement increasing focus duration and disable during a focus or break session */}
{/* TODO: Update this text to display the current break session duration */} Break Duration: {secondsToDuration(durations.breakDuration)}
{/* TODO: Implement decreasing break duration and disable during a focus or break session*/} {/* TODO: Implement increasing break duration and disable during a focus or break session*/}
) }; export default BreakDuration;
